sources.title: Smart Home Market - Growth, Trends, COVID-19 Impact, and Forecasts (2021 - 2026)
key_findings: The smart home market was valued at USD 77.3 billion in 2020 and is expected to reach USD 135.3 billion by 2025, at a CAGR of 11.9% over the forecast period 2020 - 2025.

The major players include - Siemens AG, General Electric Company, Schneider Electric SE, Honeywell International Inc., Ingersoll-Rand PLC (Trane Inc.), Johnson Controls Inc., ABB Ltd., Legrand SA, Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd, etc.
sources.usage_note: This report provides an overview of the major players in the smart home market, which could be potential competitors for HappyNest.

sources.title: Smart Home Market in Germany - Statistics & Facts
key_findings: Revenue in the Smart Home market is projected to reach US$4,571m in 2024.
The market's largest segment is Control and Connectivity with a projected market volume of US$1,695m in 2024.
sources.usage_note: This report provides insights into the smart home market in Germany, which is the target market for HappyNest. The major segment of Control and Connectivity could be a potential area of competition.

assumptions: The business idea of HappyNest is related to the smart home market.
